name: appZui Technologies Pvt Ltd
description:
We are a digital transformation company that pursues mobile and web application development on the cloud. We have a custom, in-house engineering framework called JetSetGO that helps develop products/solutions with a considerable go-to-market speed and reliability. We have pre-built solutions that can help through the transformation journey in areas of dev-ops, testing, and record management.
Our team works with you through the transformation lifecycle right from making build vs buy decisions all the way up to delivery and digital marketing. 
We are a mix of IT veterans and today's programmers. We have robust processes, seamless communication capabilities and your success on our minds.
